category: news
title: "Artificial Intelligence Predicts Delirium Risk"
excerpt: "During an ICU stay, the newly developed artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms were found to detect the early warning delirium signs. Patients in ICU stay are at an increased risk of delirium. \"Being able to differentiate between patients at low and high risk of delirium is incredibly important in the ICU because it enables us to devote more resources toward interventions in the high-risk population,"
